channel.title: How i can be a Admin on my Server?
channel.description: How i can be a Admin on my server?? Arledy got all client work :) i making webstie donor and more. Fast help please.

item.title: How i can be a Admin on my Server?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Repu, post:4, topic:428596”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=531285.msg3881398#msg3881398 date=1326057009]
What revision?
[/quote]The revision doesn’t matter, p mod and admin is 1 and 2 respectively in pretty much every revision.
The only thing that could change how it’s done is if the server is loading character files in a different way, e.g. XML in which you would have to find the param or something similar and make it 1 or 2. (I have observed that usually servers which implement XML also remove p rights 3)[/quote]
508+ doesn’t modify character file, and after 474 (I think) 3 is removed and it’s only 1 and 2.

Read full topic
item.source: How i can be a Admin on my Server?

item.title: How i can be a Admin on my Server?
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:3, topic:428596”]What revision?[/quote]The revision doesn’t matter, p mod and admin is 1 and 2 respectively in pretty much every revision.
The only thing that could change how it’s done is if the server is loading character files in a different way, e.g. XML in which you would have to find the param or something similar and make it 1 or 2. (I have observed that usually servers which implement XML also remove p rights 3)

Read full topic
item.source: How i can be a Admin on my Server?

item.title: How i can be a Admin on my Server?
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

Find your account file and change the ‘token’ “character-rights” to 2.
No Power = 0
Player Mod = 1
Admin = 2
‘Owner’ = 3

Read full topic
item.source: How i can be a Admin on my Server?
